data.title: Public Comment Period for Emergency Rulemaking Action Related to Cannabis Cultivation Licensing
data.excerpt: On Monday, November 27, 2017, the California Department of Food and Agriculture (CDFA) submitted its emergency rulemaking action related to cannabis cultivation licensing to the Office of Administrative Law (OAL).
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
